entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm north of Cape Ray. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
